PART.P: I am writing to tell you about the festival in this time and I would like to suggest you three things for next festival.

First of all, it is great idea to have a this kind of festival. I enjoyed it so much. But, there are three things which I would like to tell you. Firstly. There were stars and artists from only six countries. I supposed to see quite various nationality. Secondly, I actually liked Jazz, rock and classical concerts very much. However, some concert halls were too small for the many people so we couldn't have a enough space. thirdly. I would like to you to consider about having more plays and films next year. It would be nicer.
Otherwise, the price was really reasonable for all:events the weekend. I was satisfied with that.
And if there was musical event. It would be greatful. I hope the next one will be better. And I would like to thank you about making this festival.
I look forward to next festival very much.
Hello. How are you doing? I hope you're well. It's nice to hear about your class. It's quite interesting.

I'm looking forward to getting your letter soon.
